title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 5) Order, 2023
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 287
Gazette dated Fiday, 3rd November, 2023
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 46 of 2023
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 5) Order, 2023
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.
5) Order, 2023.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the time of
nomination
Returning Officer on Thursday, 26th October, 2023, between 0900 for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 27th Campaign
October, 2023, at 1400 hours and close at 1800 hours on Thursday, period
30th November, 2023.
4. (1) A poll for the election of a Councillor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Friday, 1st December, and time of
poll
2023, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
5. The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) Revocation
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023, is revoked. of S.I. No.
44 of 2023
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
288 Statutory Instruments 3rd November, 2023
